title: Viva Loss
description: Poetry. Prose Poems. Fiction. "Sarah Fran Wisby's fables and speculations have an unguarded quality--they are without prudery or self-protection. Her book, VIVA LOSS, is harsh, juicy, learned, and tender. But the loss in the title turns to wonder as Wisby surprises us with the truth--that is, what can be said--about ourselves"--Robert Gluck.
author: Sarah Fran Wisby
